[{"id":"JT-37823","entityId":"25-1313819","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"37823"},{"name":"summary","value":"Mapping settings are automatically changed on creation"},{"name":"description","value":"
  1. Add new mapping to teamcity server on Teamcity Integration Tab in project settings
  2. Do not change mapping settings suggested by default: Screen Shot 2016-09-27 at 13.38.53.png
  3. Save mapping as result you can see that saved settings differ from presets Screen Shot 2016-09-27 at 12.09.23.png

Build 27439
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1474976881582"},{"name":"updated","value":"1539075037257"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Alexander.Volfman"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Alexander Volfman"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"pasha"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Pavel Nikolaev"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"7"},{"name":"votes","value":"1"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-38042","type":"Duplicate","role":"is duplicated by"},{"value":"YTB-422","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["TeamCity Integration"],"valueId":["TeamCity Integration"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Settings"],"valueId":["Frontend","Settings"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Affected versions","value":["7.0"],"valueId":["7.0"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 77","id":"YouTrack:sprint 77"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Screen Shot 2016-09-27 at 12.09.23.png","id":"74-346588","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/Screen%20Shot%202016-09-27%20at%2012.09.23.png?file=74-346588&c=true"},{"value":"Screen Shot 2016-09-27 at 13.38.53.png","id":"74-346589","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/Screen%20Shot%202016-09-27%20at%2013.38.53.png?file=74-346589&c=true"},{"value":"image1529067105786.png","id":"74-535991","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1529067105786.png?file=74-535991&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2212549","author":"nik","authorFullName":"Nikolay Chashnikov","issueId":"JT-37823","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
The problem is still actual in build 33609 of YouTrack 2017.2, and I think it's rather serious. Today I was also really lucky that I noticed that YouTrack enabled 'Issues matching query' option after I created a mapping, otherwise we can get incorrect values in many issues. Also it's annoying to edit each mapping twice when you need to create 10 mappings in different projects.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1496755198362,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"jetbrains-team","markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2471188","author":"nik","authorFullName":"Nikolay Chashnikov","issueId":"JT-37823","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
The problem is still actual in YouTrack 2017.3 build 36626. And it's still annoying to edit each mapping twice when you create many of them.
